segments.text: Oh no, that stool is about to tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and he’s not even steady on his feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he’s risking it just for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s not even trying to help him balance or anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he’s going to land right on that wet floor, and that’s not going to end well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just grab him before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he’s holding that plate is just making things worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this; it’s making me too nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn’t the woman turn around and see what’s happening?
segments.speaker: PAR
